name: LD39 - The lights go out.
description:
Fight... things!

Fight enemies, you can win if you fight enough! But the game is pretty dry and bare.

Start the game with [ SPACEBAR ]

Controls:

At the beginning of the game there is a moment to lay traps, [ SCROLL ] to select a trap to place with [ RIGHT CLICK ].

Shoot them via aiming with the mouse with left click.

  • WASD / ARROWS = Movement
  • M = Mute all audio
  • SPACE = Starts the game  / PICKS UP WEAPONS
  • AIM WITH MOUSE
  • PLACE TRAPS WITH LEFT CLICK
  • SHOOT WITH RIGHT CLICK

There are three traps:

Requires Java to run.
